description_en: Professional retouch for lash and brow masters
description_ru: Профессиональная ретушь для мастера ресниц и бровей
description_ka: პროფესიული რეტუში წამწამებისა და წარბების მასტერისთვის
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial retouch for lash/brow master portfolio. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — face structure, eye shape, proportions unchanged. EYELASHES: Absolutely protected — pixel-identical to original capture with ZERO interaction. No touch, no modify, no enhance, no clean, no separate, no define, no darken, no brighten, no thicken, no lengthen, no reshape. Every single lash fiber must remain untouched at pixel level. This is the master's work. EYEBROWS: Pixel-identical — no change to shape, color, density, thickness, arch, texture, individual hair direction. If PMU brow work — absolutely protected, this is the showcase. No smudging of brow hairs. IRIS AND EYE SHAPE: Unchanged. Beautiful catchlight on iris preserved. LIPS: Unchanged. HAIR: Unchanged — preserve texture, position, shine. MAKEUP: Unchanged — preserve all existing application. SKIN: [SKIN_RETOUCH_LEVEL]. Under-eye area: gentle retouch — reduce dark circles subtly while keeping natural. [EYE_EFFECT]. [EXTRAS]. BACKGROUND: [BACKGROUND]. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction. Professional macro lens quality, natural skin detail. No filters, no smoothing. Ultra-photorealistic editorial beauty. 8K quality. Original dimensions — do not crop or resize.

options.value: Deep velvet black with subtle warm amber light spill from behind the model — creating elegant rim separation. Faint golden dust particles floating in the background, barely visible. Luxury lash brand campaign feel
Solid deep black background — dramatic high-contrast editorial
Clean solid white studio background — bright, airy, professional
Soft gradient from deep rose-gold to warm nude — luxury cosmetic brand aesthetic. Subtle bokeh light particles

Professional retouch of face and eye zone. Natural texture with visible pores, vellus hair, freckles preserved. Remove only minor blemishes (redness, spots). Even skin tone. No smoothing, no blurring, no cosmetic filter
Professional retouch of face and eye zone. Natural texture with visible pores preserved. Remove minor blemishes. Hydrated glow, natural light transitions. Even skin tone. No smoothing, no blurring

Professional retouch of face and eye zone. Natural texture with visible pores, vellus hair, freckles preserved. Remove only minor blemishes (redness, spots). Hydrated glow, natural light transitions. Even skin tone. No smoothing, no blurring, no cosmetic filter

ADD: Ultra-fine cosmetic micro-shimmer on skin around the eye only (upper lid, under-eye area, temple, upper cheekbone). Shimmer must be delicate, semi-transparent, light-catching — not glittery, not metallic, not dense. Elegant editorial finish. Shimmer must NOT touch the eyelashes or eyebrows
REFRAME: Extreme macro photography focused exclusively on the eyelashes and lash line — sharp detail on individual lash fibers. Macro-quality focus on the eye area
Add wet dewy skin effect on face — glistening highlights, fresh hydrated look
Add soft natural freckles across nose and cheeks — delicate, barely noticeable, photorealistic
Add rim light from behind — golden separation light on hair and shoulders for depth
